content: नम्र {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [नम्-र] {@--1@} Bowing, bowing down, bent, inclined, hanging down; भवंति नम्रास्तरवः फलागमैः <ls>Ś. 5. 12</ls>; स्तोकनम्रा स्तनाभ्यां <ls>Me. 82</ls>; <ls>Pt. 1. 106</ls>; <ls>Ratn. 1. 19.</ls> {@--2@} Bowing down, making a low obeisance; अभूच्च नम्रः प्रणिपातशिक्षया <ls>R. 3. 25</ls>; इत्युच्यते ताभिरुमा स्म नम्रा <ls>Ku. 7. 28.</ls> {@--3@} Lowly, submissive, humble, reverential; as in भक्तिनम्रः <ls>Me. 55.</ls> {@--4@} Crooked, curved. {@--5@} Worshipping. {@--6@} Devoted or attached to
